pages.text: These two materials are created via a Terrestrial Agglomeration Plate variant, similar to how your first Floating Crystal was made.

pages.title: Mana Infused Ingot
pages.text: Costs: $(br)$(li)1 Starmetal Ingot$(li)1 Void Metal Ingot$(li)1 Elementium Ingot$(li)1 Psimetal Ingot$(li)1 Dawnstone Ingot$(br2)Mana: One whole pool

pages.title: Mana Dust
pages.text: Costs: $(br)$(li)Stardust$(li)Skystone Dust$(li)Mana Powder$(li)Psidust$(li)Ember Grit$(br2)Mana: One whole pool
